tr1: Number of connections having the same destination host IP address
tr2: Number of connections having the same port number
tr3: The percentage of connections that were to the same service, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_count(32)
tr4: The percentage of connections that were to different services, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_count(32)
tr5: The percentage of connections that were to the same source port, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_count(32)
tr6: The percentage of connections that were to different destination machines, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_srv_count(33)
tr7: The percentage of connections that have activated the flag(4) s0, s1, s2 or s3, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_count(32)
tr8: The percentage of connections that have activated the flag(4) s0, s1, s2 or s3, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_srv_count(33)
tr9: The percentage of connections that ave activated the flag(4) REJ, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_count(32)
tr10: The percentage of connections that ave activated the flag(4) REJ, among the connections aggregated in dst_host_srv_count(33)
